modName: Pants For Imperial Heavy Armor ----Male Only
summary: The poor imperials were unaware of the bitter cold weather of skyrim, fortunately they\'ve finally realized they need to wear some pants!
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER]IMPERIAL PANTS[/CENTER]

Description
-------------------
I\'ve added the iron armor pants to the  heavy imperial armor because some men just don\'t like wearing skirts.
I made this mod as a thank you gift for another mod, if that makes sense.

Download info
---------------------
Drop textures and meshes into your Data folder and you\'re good.
Unistall by removing Cuirassheavy from the imperial mesh folder and removing imperialpants.dds from the imperial armor texture folder.

Programs Used
---------------------
Nifskope
Gimp
Photoshop

Special Thanks To
------------------
Bethesda (duh)
QuickFox again for teaching me how to layer and do transparencies
Luthrael for saving Meeko!


Before it is asked I will not make a female version because as a female myself..... I like wearing skirts :P
author: Feather Grey
